subject: Remove implicit dependency on the public Internet

values.-1: This patch needs further work before it can be merged
values.+1: Looks good to me, but someone else must approve

messages.message:
Patch Set 1:

In the future, also, maybe don't add bots to the reviewer list, even if they're technically members of the core reviewer team. This seems like a very low priority item and attempting to spam all the core reviewers is extremely poor manners.

Patch Set 1:

(2 comments)

I simply added the `glance-core` group to the reviewer list, as by default there were no reviewers.  If this causes problems, fix the group.

Patch Set 2: Verified-1

Patch Set 4: Code-Review+1

This change allows tests to pass when running inside 'corporate-style' networks that block 'example.com'

Patch Set 4:

Build failed (check pipeline).  For information on how to proceed, see http://docs.openstack.org/infra/manual/developers.html#automated-testing

- ext-glance-zuul : EXCEPTION

Patch Set 4: Code-Review+1

Important commit for testing in walled off areas (firewalls etc.). Happy to see this one addressed

Patch Set 4: Code-Review-1

I don't think spinning up a web server is the right solution here. Anything that would need to actually make an external call should just be mocked out.
